articles.description: England captain Owen Farrell admits that is has been difficult to watch his team-mates at the Rugby World Cup while he serves out a ban for a high tackle.

articles.description: Aston Villa make a poor start to their first European campaign in 13 years as appalling defending allows Legia Warsaw to get the better of them in the Europa Conference League.
articles.title: Defensive errors cost Villa at Legia Warsaw

articles.description: Georgia Hall and Celine Boutier will renew their unbeaten partnership when Europe's Solheim Cup defence gets under way on Friday at Finca Cortesin, Spain.
articles.title: Hall & Boutier reunited for opening Solheim match

articles.description: Saudi Arabia crown prince Mohammed bin Salman says he is focused on economic targets.
articles.title: 'I don't care about sportswashing'
